files.patch:
@@ -1204,1 +1204,1 @@
-     * appendOffset("+HH:mm:ss", "Z")} will be used to parse the offset,
+     * appendOffset("+HH", "Z")} in lenient mode will be used to parse the offset,

@@ -899,2 +899,2 @@
-     * appendOffset("+HH:mm:ss", "Z")} will be used to parse the offset, converting
-     * the instant to UTC as necessary.
+     * appendOffset("+HH", "Z")} in lenient mode will be used to parse the offset,
+     * converting the instant to UTC as necessary.
@@ -3892,1 +3892,2 @@
-                    .appendOffset("+HH:mm:ss", "Z")
+                    .parseLenient()
+                    .appendOffset("+HH", "Z")
